TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Too much chlorophyll I presume

What cars are in your garage (model and year preferably, i like cars)
(And also how does the garage fit the bookcase in your room.)

He uses the shrink ray from “honey i shrunk the kids”

why mystery goo?

223901242021

224001242021

Edited January 25, 2021 by AlamoVampire

26 minutes ago, AlamoVampire said:

He uses the shrink ray from “honey i shrunk the kids”

why mystery goo?

223901242021

224001242021

Because "dog sent to their doom" wasn't PG.

Why did Lunar Orbit Rendezvous get picked over direct-ascent?

To hire one pilot more.

Why did Apollo have three Pilots, but no Engineers and Scientists?

Because they were in sandbox mode. 

why did voyager voyage?

Into outer space.

What actual functioning cars does the next person own.

Again, the ones in my garage.

Why do people keep asking about my cars?

Because they don't believe you have a garage.

Why @Popestaravoids telling about his cars?

Because he doesn't have a garage

What car does @Popestarhave in his real life garage

None, I have a truck and an SUV.

Can we talk about something other than my RL vehicles?

Alright fine.

What is the meaning of life.

42.

Why is hand sanitizer bad at its job?

Because it's for washing, not for drinking.

Is a gas mask still a proper mask?

Only when used for gas.

If turtles lose their shell, are they naked or homeless?

They are caseless. Because shells.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caseless_ammunition

Who are better: turtles or tortoises?

Tortoises are good at going across land, but turtles are better since when they swim they easily reach a quarter the speed of light launching themselves to exact destinations like Proxima Centauri in about 16 years thanks to someone who funneled the entirety of Niagara Falls through a straw.

 

Could you destroy the moon by funneling Niagra falls through a straw and hitting the moon?

Depends on the water pressure. I believe if we ask Ikea to make a conically shaped straw long and strong enough, that is it being wide at the base so as to funnel all of Niagra Fall's (well Water Jet now) and narrow on top so as to pressurise the water flowing through with great force into a small jet that has immense force. Through forcing the water out such a tiny nozzle, we should be able to eventually slice the Moon the in half or quarters, minced or even finely chopped up and diced. Of course this is all just a "what if" ...Or is it? *groovy mystery music begins*

Does the next messenger approve of this message?

i guess

does the next messenger approve the post before this?

Yes

Does the next messenger approve of this post?

Depends on the next messenger: Skype, Telegram, TicToc, Wuzzup, or what.

Or what?

No, why.

How?

Any way you prefer, but following the approved standards.

Am I the only one who instinctively wants to place these hexagon and circle  inside each other?

*laugh* B!

 

What number divides evenly with zero?

Do some reading.  Division by zero - Wikipedia

Do numbers ever lie?
